card.name: CW - Show Courts on the list view

data.text:
@yasserogier 
Hi Yasser

I have added the field "CourtName" to the below mentioned sprocs on DEV

BUREAUPORTAL_SELECT_Query_Bureau_Submitted
BUREAUPORTAL_SELECT_Query_Bureau_Feedback
BUREAUPORTAL_SELECT_Query_Bureau_Completed

BUREAUPORTAL_SELECT_Query_BureauPortalAdmin_New
BUREAUPORTAL_SELECT_Query_BureauPortalAdmin_SentToUA
BUREAUPORTAL_SELECT_Query_BureauPortalAdmin_Feedback
BUREAUPORTAL_SELECT_Query_BureauPortalAdmin_Completed

BUREAUPORTAL_SELECT_Query_UpliftmentAgent_New
BUREAUPORTAL_SELECT_Query_UpliftmentAgent_Acknowledged
BUREAUPORTAL_SELECT_Query_UpliftmentAgent_Completed
